mapper.select: select id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_info, head_img, create_time from mybatis.sys_user where id = #{id}
select id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_info, head_img, create_time from mybatis.sys_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: /*useGeneratedKeys, 取出由mysql生成的主键, 赋值给keyProperty*/ insert into mybatis.sys_user(user_name, user_password, user_email, user_info, head_img, create_time) values (#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userInfo}, #{headImg, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into mybatis.sys_user(user_name, user_password, user_email, user_info, head_img, create_time) values (#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userInfo}, #{headImg, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) /*为id列生成, 赋值给id字段; selectKey不受放置位置的影响*/ /*oracle中使用before, 需要先从序列中获取值*/ select last_insert_id()
mapper.update:
update mybatis.sys_user
user_name = #{userName},
user_password = #{userPassword},
user_email = #{userEmail},
user_info = #{userInfo},
head_img = #{headImg},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime, u.user_name as "user.userName", /*将值赋值给user字段中的属性*/ u.user_email as "user.userEmail" from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id = #{userId}

select r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id = #{userId} and r.enabled = #{enabled} /*0或param1都行; 但是一般使用注解*/
